item.title: Cold Staking Pools
item.description: The importance of decentralization Available Staking Pools Advanced Running your own Pool In the context of cryptocurrency mining, a mining pool is the pooling of resources by miners, who share their processing power over a network, to split the reward equally, according to the amount of work they contributed to the probability of finding a block. — Wikipedia
